name: Golden Guardian // Gold-Forge Garrison
originalText:
(Transforms from Golden Guardian.)
{T}: Add two mana of any one color to your mana pool.
{4}, {T}: Create a 4/4 colorless Golem artifact creature token.

rulings.text: If the target of Golden Guardian’s activated ability isn’t a legal target as that ability resolves, or if Golden Guardian has left the battlefield, neither creature will deal or be dealt damage.
Once Golden Guardian’s activated ability has resolved, it will return to the battlefield transformed if it dies for any reason in that turn.
If Golden Guardian leaves the battlefield before its activated ability has resolved, it won’t be returned to the battlefield when the ability resolves.
For more information on double-faced cards, see the Ixalan mechanics article (http://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/feature/ixalan-mechanics).
